member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ImageBox.AllowClickZoom
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether clicking the control with the mouse will automatically zoom in or out.
member.value: true if clicking the control allows zooming; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ImageBox.AllowDoubleClick
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the DoubleClick event can be raised.
member.value: true if the DoubleClick event can be raised; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ImageBox.AllowFreePan
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether free panning can be used
member.value: true if free panning can be used, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ImageBox.AllowUnfocusedMouseWheel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the mouse wheel is processed event if the doesn't have focus.
member.value: true if the mouse wheel is processed regardless of focus, otherwise false to only process the mouse wheel when the control has focus.
member.remarks: Setting this problem to true could cause conflicting behavior with other controls that also make use of the mouse wheel.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ImageBox.AllowZoom
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can change the zoom level.
member.value: true if the zoom level can be changed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ImageBox.AutoCenter
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the image is centered where possible.
member.value: true if the image should be centered where possible; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ImageBox.AutoPan
member.summary: Gets or sets if the mouse can be used to pan the control.
member.value: true if the control can be auto panned; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: If this property is set, the SizeToFit property cannot be used.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ImageBox.AutoScroll
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the container enables the user to scroll to any content placed outside of its visible boundaries.
member.value: true if the container enables auto-scrolling; otherwise, false.
